short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Grab colors from webpages anytime, instant color picker and personal color history.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easy Color Picker is a very nice tool for developers and designers to grab colors from web pages or select from the color-picker board. You can get the exact HEX/RGB/HSB value and keep the history of picked color.

Enjoy the ease of the colorpicker tool! Plus, we've included some of our other extensions at the bottom for your added convenience and enjoyment.

CHANGELOG
==========
Version 0.1.6 - 0.2.3
- Clean JS files and links
- Add & update the list of other extensions
- Add extension icons

Version 0.1.2 - 0.1.5
- Grab colors from web pages
- Upgrade to extension V3 standard
- Add google analytics
- Add related new tools

Version 0.1.1 - 2021-08-18
- Instant color picker
- Get HEX/RGB/HSB values
- History of picked color
